goal: Identify patterns and clusters of gender inequality across regions to facilitate targeted interventions.
persona: A data analyst with 7 years of experience in socioeconomic research, specializing in gender studies and policy analysis. They have a strong background in geospatial analysis and are interested in using data-driven insights to improve gender equality and social justice. They aim to inform policymakers and stakeholders by identifying regional disparities and trends in gender inequality through advanced spatial analysis techniques.
